name: kiddie
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a young child: Are you looking for something to do with the kiddies during the holidays? It's an interesting show, but I wouldn't bring the kiddies. I had to take my son to a kiddies' party.
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
a childchildWhen I was a child the summers seemed to go on for ever.boyThere's a new boy in my class. girlThe girl's name is Sally.kidI'm off to pick up the kids from school.kiddieI saw her with a little kiddie in a pushchair.little oneThe little ones must be hungry by now.
See more results »
More examplesFewer examplesWho's taking care of the kiddies?I hope you all had a great weekend and lots of Halloween fun with your kiddies.Potato printing is an old-fashioned, fun activity for the kiddies.There's a kiddy here who's cut his knee.

intended for young children: He wanted to order off the kiddie menu. They were trying to cut up boxes with red kiddie scissors. See also
kiddie pool
More examplesFewer examplesThis is food for adults, not kiddie food.On the day there will be live music and free kiddie rides.It's too much of a kiddie game for me.Even on a kiddie roller coaster he was terrified.
